K

KEY_START_HEIGHT - Static variable in class pitchLab.reference.Constants
 
keyPressed(KeyEvent) - Method in class pitchLab.modes.activePitch.ActivePitchControl
Key press event which switches based on the current state, the states are indicated as follows: case 0: The PitchLab test hasnt started yet case 1: Working/Busy/Random Tones Playing case 2: Single note playing, user needs to drag bar to location, enter confirms choice case 3: Means user can drag the bar! (ie: pressed in the correct location) case 4: Dead case, before user can 'accidently press enter' -- must touch drag bar first
keyPressed(KeyEvent) - Method in class pitchLab.modes.activeRelative.ActiveRelativeControl
Key press event which switches based on the current state, the states are indicated as follows: case 0: The PitchLab test hasn't started yet case 1: Working/Busy/Random Tones Playing case 2: Single note playing, user needs to drag bar to location, enter confirms choice case 3: Means user can drag the bar! (ie: pressed in the correct location) case 4: User hasn't heard first tone yet case 5: User hasn't heard second tone yet case 6: User hasn't made bar appear yet
keyPressed(KeyEvent) - Method in class pitchLab.modes.activeRelative.ARCPractice
 
keyPressed(KeyEvent) - Method in class pitchLab.modes.passivePitch.PassivePitchControl
Key press event which switches based on the current state, the states are indicated as follows: case 0: The PitchLab test hasnt started yet case 1: Working/Busy/Random Tones Playing case 2: Single note playing, user needs to drag bar to location, enter confirms choice case 3: Means user can drag the bar! (ie: pressed in the correct location) case 4: Dead case, before user can 'accidently press enter' -- must touch drag bar first
keyPressed(KeyEvent) - Method in class pitchLab.modes.passiveRelative.PassiveRelativeControl
Key press event which switches based on the current state, the states are indicated as follows: case 0: The PitchLab test hasn't started yet case 1: Working/Busy/Random Tones Playing case 2: Single note playing, user needs to drag bar to location, enter confirms choice case 3: Means user can drag the bar! (ie: pressed in the correct location) case 4: User hasn't heard first tone yet case 5: User hasn't heard second tone yet case 6: User hasn't made bar appear yet Also the cases are based on key pressed entires as well - for numbers 1, 2 and the Enter.
keyPressed(KeyEvent) - Method in class pitchLab.modes.passiveRelative.PRCPractice
 
keyReleased(KeyEvent) - Method in class pitchLab.modes.activePitch.ActivePitchControl
 
keyReleased(KeyEvent) - Method in class pitchLab.modes.activeRelative.ActiveRelativeControl
The key up event that triggers the playing of the selected tone.

keyReleased(KeyEvent) - Method in class pitchLab.modes.passiveRelative.PassiveRelativeControl
The key up event that triggers the playing of the selected tone.
keyReleased(KeyEvent) - Method in class pitchLab.modes.passiveRelative.PRCPractice

shuts down server
